definition: to break (e.g. stick or bone)/a loss

to break/to fracture/to snap/to suffer loss/to bend/to twist/to turn/to change direction/convinced/to convert into (currency)/discount/rebate/tenth (in price)/classifier for theatrical scenes/to fold/accounts book
to turn sth over/to turn upside down/to tip sth out (of a container)
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: The reflected head of the rectus femoris is also sometimes released to improve exposure.
sentences.chinese: 股直肌的返折頭有時也予以鬆解以改善顯露。

sentences.english: Waiter: I'm sorry. Discount card and vouchers are not to be used together.
sentences.chinese: 對不起，折頭卡與贈券不可以同時使用。
